confidence.notes: Price/technical metrics are high confidence from direct OHLC data. Fundamental and valuation confidence moderated by partial reliance on third-party aggregation and SEC fetch blockage.

thesis: Atlassian combines resilient double-digit growth and strong free-cash-flow economics with a heavily derated valuation multiple. The stock is technically damaged and high-volatility, but if growth and enterprise monetization remain intact, a 12-month re-rating toward mid-90s is plausible.
risk_flags: Prolonged risk-off sentiment toward software growth equities
Sustained GAAP operating losses / margin disappointment
Cloud growth deceleration and weaker net retention
High realized volatility and potential for deep interim drawdowns
